data.name: Spine
data.detailed_description:
Ever wondered what's it like to become a hero of an action movie? To be in the epicenter of action, kick the gun out of the hand of your opponent, parry a bullet with your trusty katana?

Then look no further! Spine is a cinematic game about close-quarters gun fights. Become a hero of your favorite action movie, grab your guns, enhance reflexes with a Spine augmentation - and get ready to fight!

The game uncovers the story of a cyberpunk city in the near future. Have you read the news that a Tensor AI transformed this city into literal heaven on Earth? Or would you rather listen to the whispers of the opposition? Join the fights on the city streets and participate in the global conflict of powerful factions, while seeking your personal revenge. The environments and situations you'll meet your enemies in are inspired by iconic action movies.


There you are, our action hero!
Make yourself comfortable as we've prepared a large arsenal of abilities using Spine technology. Acquire supernatural reaction speed, use Spine augmentation to instantly aim at your enemies and unleash your inner hero - because your gun fu is definitely stronger!

Camera, Action, Shoot!
Every fight in Spine is a combination of breathtaking scenes where you become a hero beating up some bad guys. Feel the tension of each in-game moment thanks to the unique camera-work and combat choreography set up by actual action movie specialists. We will provide you with an exceptional movie-like experience you'll find nowhere else in the action games.

Guns, guns, guns!
Find out what the real gun-fu bullet ballet is! Switch between cold weapons and firearms in close range combat. Shoot with both hands while jumping, block bullets with katanas, spray and pray! During the mayhem of battle, Spine will demonstrate the utmost precision and help you coordinate your actions with the best possible outcomes.



And remember, Tensor AI is looking after you and reminds you: any form of cooperation with the Resistance will lead to your city status being revised. The Spine technology guarantees the safety of society, if you abide by the Tensor's rules.

data.short_description: Spine is a single-player story rich action game focused on intense close-quarters gun fights with aesthetics of Gun fu movies. Boost your reflexes using a Spine augmentation and shoot the bad guys up close, en masse while performing all kinds of choreographic moves with your firearms!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6400 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX1050 with 2 GB VRAM or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Motherboard Integrated sound card (DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:

  • Processor: Intel Core i7-8700 or equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Motherboard Integrated sound card (DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card)
